tomconn.growthapi.interfaces.registry.classbased

Interface IClassBasedRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICBRRegistrationMethods, ICBRRetrievalMethods
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassBasedRegistry, GrowthRegistry

    public interface IClassBasedRegistry
extends ICBRRegistrationMethods, ICBRRetrievalMethods
    This interface provides methods which are supposed to be implemented by every registry. A registry is an object which holds references to all blocks which can show up in any of the three in this API covered events (BlockEvent.CropGrowEvent.Pre, BlockEvent.CropGrowEvent.Post and SaplingGrowTreeEvent).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface tomconn.growthapi.interfaces.registry.classbased.ICBRRegistrationMethods

        registerCropPost, registerCropPre, registerSapling

      • Methods inherited from interface tomconn.growthapi.interfaces.registry.classbased.ICBRRetrievalMethods

        getConsumerForCropPost, getRequirementsForCropPre, getRequirementsForSapling
